statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT location, sensor_type, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading FROM SensorData WHERE location = 'Room A' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, AVG(reading) AS Avg_Reading FROM SensorData GROUP BY device_id HAVING Avg_Reading > 30;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, reading FROM SensorData WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY reading ASC
SELECT AVG(reading) AS average_reading, location FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY location HAVING average_reading > 50
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) AS unique_devices, sensor_type FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING unique_devices > 5
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, measurement_type, timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND location = 'Lab A';
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp, measurement_type, value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE measurement_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name AS 'Sensor Name', location AS 'Sensor Location' FROM sensors WHERE location <> 'Office' ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE data_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM Devices WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY device_location ASC;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, reading FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature'
SELECT device_type, device_location FROM Devices WHERE is_active=true
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, data_value FROM Sensors WHERE data_type='Humidity'
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT city_name, country, population FROM city WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM device WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT infra_id, infra_type, status FROM infrastructure WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT city_name, country, population FROM city ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM device WHERE device_type = 'Sensors' AND location LIKE '%building';
SELECT * FROM infrastructure WHERE status IN ('Active', 'Under Maintenance') ORDER BY infra_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, value FROM sensors WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure WHERE infra_type = 'Power Plant';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_type, location, value FROM sensors WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Sensor%';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
